Class OrderCard

java.lang.Object
com.vaadin.starter.bakery.ui.views.storefront.OrderCard
public class OrderCard extends Object
Represents a UI card for displaying order information in grids such as Storefront and Dashboard.

Uses LitRenderer to reduce CPU and memory usage compared to ComponentRenderer. The card may optionally include a header to group orders visually by date or category.

  • Constructor Details

    • OrderCard

      public OrderCard(OrderSummary order)
      Constructs an OrderCard from an OrderSummary. Determines if the order is considered "recent" (today or yesterday) or falls within the current week.
      Parameters:
      order - the order summary to wrap.

  • Method Details

    • getTemplate

      public static com.vaadin.flow.data.renderer.LitRenderer<Order> getTemplate()
      Creates a LitRenderer template for displaying an order card in a grid. The template binds the order data and an optional header, and supports click events on the card.
      Returns:
      a LitRenderer template for Order objects.

    • create

      public static OrderCard create(OrderSummary order)
      Factory method to create an OrderCard instance from an OrderSummary.
      Parameters:
      order - the order summary to wrap.
      Returns:
      a new OrderCard instance.

    • getPlace

      public String getPlace()
      Returns the pickup location name for orders that are recent or in the same week.
      Returns:
      the pickup location name, or null if not applicable.

    • getTime

      public String getTime()
      Returns the formatted due time for recent orders.
      Returns:
      the due time as a string, or null if the order is not recent.

    • getShortDay

      public String getShortDay()
      Returns a short day string (e.g., Mon, Tue) for orders within the current week.
      Returns:
      a short day string, or null if the order is not in the same week.
